TopicTitle: Anti-aliasing in OpenGL mode via Nvidia Inspector

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Is it at all possible to force anti-aliasing via Nvidia Inspector while in OpenGL with a similar performance hit to running normal anti-aliasing outside of OpenGL mode?

If this is the wrong sub-forum, my apologies.

Thanks.

I believe you should ask this on an Nvidia forum, though it looks like there is very little to no documentation.

The Nvidia settings should have global and per-program anti-aliasing overrides though.
